message: You can use convore by going to the website http://convore.com or with an iPhone app. I am also told there's an android app. On convore you can join or create public or private groups. Within groups you can create topics. If you include the http:// in a URL convore will make it a hot link. If you include a image or photo URL convore will display the photo in-line.
In the above example I right mouse clicked on a photo in my picasa web-album and copied the image URL and then posted it here.
